pack.name: ASCO GI 2026
pack.tagline: Pharma sponsors and presenting authors at the 2026 ASCO GI Symposium
pack.description: 50 pharma and biotech companies with sponsored abstracts at ASCO GI 2026 (January 23-25, San Francisco). Includes verified presenting authors — the oncology leaders driving GI cancer programs.
pack.targetBuyer: Oncology-focused platforms, clinical trial software, medical affairs tools, RWE vendors
